question:
Some of the proposed/under construction dams were frequently making headlines in recent times. Consider the following matches in this context:
  1. Tipaimukh dam- Assam
  2. Pancheswar dam- Jammu & Kashmir
  3. Sawalkot dam- Uttarakhand
Which of the above is/are correct?
explanation: Tipaimukh dam is a proposed dam on River Barak in Manipur. Barak River flows from China into India and then goes to Bangladesh. This dam is controversial political issue between Bangladesh and India. Pancheswar Dam is under construction on Mahakali River bordering Nepal and India. It is a joint project between India and Nepal being executed under the 1996 Mahakali Treaty. Sawalkot Dam is a hydroelectric power project based on the Chenab River in Udhampur district of Jammu & Kashmir. The dam has been frequently in news for its high vulnerability to earthquakes and causing great disaster to Pakistan in future.
